_source.text: 1. On a Saturday 2. Try to Think About Me (Don't You Worry a Bit) 3. When the Sun Rose Up This Morning 4. My Home Is Nowhere Without You 5. Afternoon Dance Party, An 6. Someone Knows Better Than Me 7. Next Year in Zion 8. Lovers Are Waterproof 9. Baby Is Afraid of Sharks 10.

text: Morning 4. My Home Is Nowhere Without You 5. Afternoon Dance Party, An 6. Someone Knows **Better** **Than** Me 7
. **Next** Year in Zion 8. Lovers Are Waterproof 9. Baby Is Afraid of **Sharks** 10.

_source.text: After being plucked off re-entry waivers by the Isles away from the Detroit Red Wings who were looking for backup goalie insurance with the former Sharks superstar, Nabokov decided sitting at home was better than playing out the string with the Islanders.

text: was **better** **than** playing out the string with the Islanders.
